attributes.action: force all NHS Hospital Trusts and Primary Care Trusts to collect the costs of treatment from all foreign patients who are not entitled to free treatment on the NHS
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Millions of pounds are currently not being collected from foreign patients who are not entitled to free treatment on the NHS. In fact, thousands of foreign nationals come here to get free maternity care, free treatment for AIDS and for many other diseases. This is a scandalous waste of precious resources which is preventing the money from being used to fund eg cancer care for British nationals.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
